document_data.name: Interrogation in Three Levels
document_data.mainbody: '''''Interrogation in Three Levels''''' was a [[book|textbook]] used to teach [[Sharran]] initiates skills of interrogation, printed sometime in or before the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Content: The text book collected information on how to inflict three levels of stress during interrogations: emotional, physical, and lethal. It instructed to prioritize extracting information over inflicting harm, warning the interrogator from developing a sadistic emotional response to the process of interrogation or sympathy for the subject.
document_data.History: ''Interrogation in Three Levels'' was used by the acolytes of the [[Cloister of Sombre Embrace]], hidden underneath the [[House of Grief]] in the [[Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in the late 15{{th}} century DR.
